channel.title: Ranging Target Question
channel.description:
Hey, whenever someone on my server levels up by use of the ranging targets at ::range, they are immediately disconnected. I've been trying to find the source of this problem, but to no avail. If someone would help me, it'd be greatly appreciated.
~Shadow
